fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Symphonist of Scents__
Signature weapon that buffs damage and supports the team

__Favonius Lance__
Provides Energy for the entire team, but has lower personal damage.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__ Staff of Homa, Engulfing Lightening, Deathmatch, Lumidouce Elegy, Mountain-Bracing Bolt, Calamity Queller__
Stat-sticks for personal damage. 

__If none of the above are owned:__
Use any offensive polearm with ATK%, Energy Recharge or CRIT stats.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge|<goblet> Cryo DMG Bonus% or ATK%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Low-Temperature Cooking
**2)** Elemental Burst: Scoring Cuts
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Kitchen Skills

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Blizzard Strayer__ should not be used if the target is a boss or the team does not consistently trigger Freeze.
__Tenacity of the Millelith__ sacrifices personal damage for small team buffs.
__ATK% Goblets__ are likely to outperform __Cryo DMG Bonus% Goblets__ with __Furina__ in the team.
__Elemental Mastery__ should be avoided if not building for Melt
